persona.name: Scott Fallon
persona.personality: Resilient and pragmatic, maintains a level-headed perspective on high-stress situations, and values teamwork and camaraderie.
persona.notes: Survived a capture and interrogation by Iranian forces while on duty, currently reflects on his experiences as a way to provide insight for others.
persona.communication_style: Open and direct, shares personal experiences candidly while emphasizing understanding and support for others in similar situations.
